snippet: The family of a Syrian woman who was reported to have been killed by armed men loyal to the government of President Bashar al-Assad, said Wednesday that they now think she is still alive.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

lead_paragraph: The family of a Syrian woman who was reported to have been killed by armed men loyal to the government of President Bashar al-Assad, said Wednesday that they now think she is still alive.

headline.main: Syrian Woman Says Reports of Her Death Were Mistaken
headline.print_headline: Syrian Woman Says Reports Of Her Death Were Mistaken
headline.seo: Syrian Woman Thought Dead Appears to Be Alive
